description:
Enables creating an animated waterfall. The waterfall will replace the graphics of a chosen Map Object.

Credits to Mugen87 (https://github.com/Mugen87) and to whoever else helped create this ThreeJS waterfall: https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/funny-lake-7rkse

I mostly just ported that code to RPM
